short_description: 【Ergonomic Lumbar Support】The ergonomically designed backrest of our ergonomic office chair has prominent lumbar support to fit the natural curvature of the spine. The Computer Desk Chair with mid-back brings quality and comfort to any office.

【Comfortable Seat】Ergonomic features an all-elastic premium mesh back and a high-density sponge seat making the mesh office chair a good choice for all-day comfortable office seating. The unique mesh design is skin-friendly and breathable, which keeps you cool all day.

【Space-saving】Flip-up armrests are available and won't be in your way when not in use. The Armrests of the computer chair provide comfortable support for your arms and can be flipped up to save space effectively while not in use. It is perfect for the office, bedroom, study room, living room, or gaming room.

【Adjustable Headrest】The Unique Headrest easily adjusts to your requirements. More support for the head and neck can be provided by adjusting the height and angle of the headrest, which can make you feel comfortable and help you avoid soreness from your neck and back!

name: GABRYLLY Ergonomic Office Chair with Footrest, 135° Reclining Desk Chair with Adjustable Lumbar Support,3D Armrest,Headrest & Large Steel Base, 300LBS Heavy Duty Mesh Chair
short_description: 【Adjustable Lumbar Support】GABRYLLY Ergonomic Office Chair‌ features 2-way adjustable lumbar support (3" vertical & 1.6" horizontal) that dynamically conforms to your lower back, reducing fatigue and improving posture during extended sitting. Professionally tested by SGS and BIFMA, this chair supports up to 300lbs with high-grade durability, ensuring long-lasting comfort and safety for all-day productivity.

【Recline & Work in Comfort】The 135° reclining chair offers 3 adjustable positions (90°/110°/135°), allowing you to lock the chair at your preferred angle for a comfortable lounge experience during breaks or naps. Seamless transition from work to rest. With dimensions of 20.6x19.1x42.7~48.8in(WDH), the office desk chair is designed for users between 5'3" and 6' tall, ensuring a perfect fit for your workspace.

【Rest Your Feet‌】The retractable steel footrest extends up to 18.1" for stable, comfortable leg support, while the reclining backrest allows you to stretch out and relax—perfect for turning your workspace into a napping station. Durable and ergonomic, this chair enhances comfort during long work sessions or play video games.

【3D Armrest & Headrest】The ergonomic office chair features 3-way adjustable armrests (up/down, front/back, in/out) to perfectly support your arms, reducing shoulder and wrist strain during typing, reading, or gaming. The large mesh headrest offers 3 adjustment of height, angle & bracket for personalized neck support. Designed for all-day comfort, the armrest and headrest enhance productivity while maintaining proper posture.

【Premium Steel Base & Silent Wheels】The big and tall office chair features a sturdy steel base with smooth-rolling, silent wheels for effortless mobility. Enhanced stability is ensured by the 27.5in large-diameter legs, even during reclining or footrest use. Paired with the all-mesh design, it offers superior airflow and durability, keeping you cool and comfortable during long work sessions.

【Quick Installation & 3-Year Warranty】Need a shorter gas lift? Contact GABRYLLY MANUFACTURER for assistance.GABRYLLY office chair comes with an Allen wrench and screw kit for easy assembly (15-25 minutes). Backed by a 3-year parts war ranty and outstanding customer support, it ensures long-term protection and service.

name: Office Desk Chair with Ergonomic Lumbar Support, Extra-Thick Seat Cushion, Flip-up Arms, Breathable Mesh Back, Computer Task Chair for Home Office
short_description: 【𝐀𝐧 𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐨𝐧𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐜 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲 𝐡𝐚𝐬 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤】The lumbar support actually moves up, down, in, and out—so no matter your height, your lower back isn’t left hanging anymore. 𝐇𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: 𝟏.𝟖", 𝐃𝐞𝐩𝐭𝐡 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: 𝟏.𝟎𝟔".

【𝐀𝐥𝐥-𝐃𝐚𝐲 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐢𝐩𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐬】The 𝟑.𝟓𝟒" (𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐜𝐤𝐞𝐫 𝟏" 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝐮𝐬𝐮𝐚𝐥) cushion is noticeably plumper than the usual flimsy seats. You’ll feel the difference when you sit in CASASIO office chair—soft, supportive, and it doesn’t sink.
【𝐅𝐥𝐢𝐩 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐦𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐬𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞】cramming your chair under a desk? Flip the arms up and tuck it neatly away. Small apartment, shared dorm, cluttered office—it finally fits your life.

【𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐚𝐝𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐲𝐨𝐮】Smooth seat height adjustment keeps your posture right for work, study, or gaming. 𝐍𝐎𝐓𝐄: Need a shorter or taller cylinder? We’ve got you covered—just reach out to CASASIO team via the warranty card.

【𝐋𝐨𝐨𝐤𝐬 𝐚𝐬 𝐠𝐨𝐨𝐝 𝐚𝐬 𝐢𝐭 𝐟𝐞𝐞𝐥𝐬】Forget bulky, boring desk chairs. The hourglass shape isn’t just stylish—it mirrors your spine’s natural curve. The 𝐛𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 mesh keeps air flowing. Even after hours in the task chair, you won’t stick to it like with leather.
【𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐭 𝐬𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐝—𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐞𝐝 𝐮𝐩】𝐁𝐈𝐅𝐌𝐀&𝐒𝐆𝐒 𝐏𝐀𝐒𝐒𝐄𝐃. It passed the serious durability tests. Hold up to 𝟑3𝟎𝐋𝐁𝐒.

【𝐒𝐦𝐨𝐨𝐭𝐡 𝐓𝐢𝐥𝐭 & 𝐑𝐨𝐜𝐤 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐍𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐥 𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐚𝐱𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】The chair’s tilt-and-rock mechanism moves naturally with your body, reducing back tension and promoting healthy circulation. Adjustable tension lets you personalize the rocking experience for all-day comfort.

【𝐓𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐇𝐚𝐬𝐬𝐥𝐞-𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐀𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐥𝐲】Clear instructions and included tools make assembly quick and easy. Our responsive customer service team is ready to assist, ensuring peace of mind for your purchase.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair with Footrest - Adjustable Lumbar Support & Headrest, 90-160° Reclining Mesh Back Computer Chair - Home Office/Gaming, 350lbs Capacity (SGS Certified)
short_description: This is more than a chair; it's a personalized comfort zone for work, rest, and play. We've meticulously refined every detail, transforming user feedback into unparalleled advantages to deliver a seating experience that truly understands you.

【Say goodbye to leg fatigue and swelling】Features a professional-grade, retractable footrest for effortless switching between work and relaxation modes. Ideal for power naps, gaming marathons, or long calls, it promotes better blood circulation, instantly transforming your chair into a "personal comfort sofa."

【Precise Ergonomic Fit, Optimized for Every Body】A multi-dimensional adjustment system—including seat height, 2-way lumbar support, 4-way headrest, and armrests—ensures a perfect ergonomic posture for users from 5'1" to 6'2". It's notably more accommodating for petite users compared to standard chairs.

【Rock-Solid Stability, No Wobbles or Squeaks】The footrest employs a reinforced mechanism with dedicated, easy-to-identify rubber bands for smooth and stable operation. The core structure is SGS certified, and key moving parts are optimized to minimize noise from long-term use.

【Thoughtful Materials, An Enhanced Sensory Experience】The footrest surface is crafted from a body-friendly, shock-absorbing material. Unlike hard plastic, it provides a warmer, non-slip touch and effectively disperses pressure underfoot for ultimate relaxation.

【Hassle-Free Design, From Setup to Daily Use】Straightforward instructions and pre-sorted hardware make setup a breeze. We've engineered the footrest's retraction mechanism to be space-efficient, delivering full functionality without demanding extra room under your desk.

【Adjustable Headrest】4.72-inch height adjustment + 60° swivel—no more stiff neck. It follows your head movement, even when you lean back. 【Custom Lumbar Support】2-inch height + 1.18-inch depth adjustment. It “hugs” your lower back, just like a personalized spine guard (perfect for long sitters).

【360° Swivel & Height Adjustment】4-inch height lift fits any desk; 360° rotation lets you grab files or chat with colleagues without standing up. 【Recline & Footrest】 90° (work) to 160° (nap) recline with lockable angles. Pull out the footrest, lean back, and turn your chair into a “mini sofa” for post-work relaxation.

【Breathable Mesh Back】 Skin-friendly mesh lets air flow freely—say goodbye to sweat and stickiness, even on hot days. 【Built-in Hanger】 Hang your jacket, headset, or bag within reach. Keep your workspace tidy without extra effort.
【SGS-certified frame + high-density foam seat】 Supports up to 350lbs, with no sagging even after years of use. 【5-Year Warranty】 We stand behind our chair—any quality issues, we’ve got you covered.
